title: Hi guys
body: After a long time of playing on a shitty pc (till it stopped working) I have finally purchased a new pc. To all silver / gold players be prepared. You scared? Good you're suppose to, man I told ya, putting fear in your heart, trolling the party before we even start 😏

replies.body: Hardware does help a lot in leage, I tend to play with a ping of about 200 and have abotu a 50/50 w/l ratio, but someitmes i play at a friends with good internet and WOW the differance 130 less ping makes.
Haha yeah I hope that's been the reason why I'm stuck in silver 😂
